mapper.insert: insert into delivery(RECEIVER, SENDER, SOURCE, DEST, DELIVERY_CONTENT, DELIVERY_AMOUNT, CURRENT_STATUS, EMP_CODE, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CODE) values (#{RECEIVER}, #{SENDER}, #{SOURCE}, #{DEST}, #{DELIVERY_CONTENT}, #{DELIVERY_AMOUNT}, #{CURRENT_STATUS}, #{EMP_CODE}, #{DELIVERY_DATE}, #{DELIVERY_CODE});
